src: ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? [start] RC : Yes , I do . I have to go and see someone who 's hospitalised and I ca n't remember the ward . It 's room 17 . Can you please tell me where it is ? [MASK] ARI : You continue along the building , take the lift , and it 's on the second floor . [MASK] RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . LP : Look , I have an appointment , but um , for my friend who is here . I ca n't remember the appointment time . Could you tell me ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . LP : Ok , thank you . Where is the reception ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LP : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [end] RC : I have an appointment at 5 o'clock in the cardiology department . I do n't know where that is . Could you tell me please ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( cardiology_department ) ) ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . I 'll call a nurse to come and help you . ARI : Thank you . See you soon . Have a nice day . RC : Thank you , bye . LP : See you soon . You too , have a nice day .

src: LC : Hello . ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? LC : We 're looking for a way to get to room 17 , are n't we ? @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) [start] RP : Yes . RP : Yes , we need to go to room 17 for treatment . [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LC : Thank you . [MASK] RP : Thank you . LC : Do you , do you know what time our appointment is ? [MASK] RP : Do you need the name ? ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you . [end] LC : Ok . RP : Thank you . ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . LC : Thank you ARI , have a nice day . RP : Thank you . ARI : Thank you , see you around , have a nice day .

Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you .

src: LP : Hello ARI . ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? LP : Ask how ... [start] RC : Hello . I 'd like to have a small meal , can you tell me where we should go ? [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RC : Can you tell me when the cafeteria opens ? [MASK] ARI : From 11 AM to 4 PM . [MASK] RC : From 11 AM to 4 PM , is that right ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . RC : Is the cafeteria wheelchair accessible ? Because my friend is in a wheelchair and he ca n't get around by himself .
